XMLlist.entry: Functions related to the records
Retrieves a list of records by their ids, in a specific format
Be careful about the charset requirements if you use this function. For example, if you use SOAP, you will have to manage utf-8 records.
A table containing the list of the ids of records that we want to retrieve
the format in which we want these bitches
the charset in which we want the results
include the links between records, issues and articles
include the copies in the zone 995
The different records
the record's id
the record in the wanted format
Acts like the function fetchNoticeList, except that the records are not converted into a specific format, but are sent directly as a unimarc table
Care about the charset protocols if you use this fonction. For example, if you use SOAT, you have to transform records directly into utf-8.
A table containing a list of ideas of records we want to retriever
The charset in which we want the results
include links between records, issues and articles
include the copies in the 995 zone
The different records

the id of the relevant record
the id of a borrower, to theck his/her access right on this record. -1: Do not take into account 0: anonymous borrower x: id of the borrower

id of a borrower, to check the access rights on this record. -1: Do not take into account 0: emprunteur anonymous x: id of the borrower
informations about the digital document(s) if they exist
